Html:
Is there a way to give different ranges in the X axis, different background colors. for example if my X axis is between 10 -100 so

the area between 10 to 30 will get a red background color,

the area between 30 to 60 will get a green background color

etc.

Hi

Use Vertical Range.

Search in the discussions you can find some code

﻿﻿http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/discussions/67727

Regards

Ravi
